DOC.detailed_description: Fluconazole flucytosine different mechanisms action . Since fluconazole associate hematologic suppression produce renal impairment result high serum flucytosine level , combination may better tolerate amphotericin B plus flucytosine . Patients cohort receive low dose fluconazole alone combination flucytosine , high dose fluconazole alone . Doses subsequent cohort escalate safety data previous cohort satisfactory . Patients evaluate weekly first 4 week every 2 week thereafter . Therapy continue 8 week CSF become culture negative , maximum 26 week .
